Package rocks.bastion.core.json

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    JsonRequest
    A JSON request for use during Bastion tests.
    JsonResponseAssertions
    Performs assertions on a response by checking for status code and content-type.
    JsonSchemaAssertions
    Asserts that an API response has conforms to a given JSON schema.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    InvalidJsonException
    Indicates that the JSON provided for a JsonRequest is not valid JSON.
